item.title: 美国敦促中国提高知识产权保护透明度
item.description: 在美国大选年贸易紧张局势迫在眉睫之际，美国商务部官员卡蒂-维达尔（Kathi Vidal）表示，中国政府需要更明确地说明如何保护知识产权，并应对新形式的侵权行为。【原文：Beijing needs to be clearer on how it’s protecting intellectual property and address new forms of infringement, US commerce official Kathi Vidal said as trade tensions loom in an US election year.】

item.title: 中东问题、美联储鹰派令市场情绪低落，亚洲股市暴跌
item.description: 由于对中东紧张局势升级的担忧和对美国利率长期走高的忧虑再度升温，市场普遍出现避险情绪，亚洲股市大幅下挫。【原文：Asian stocks plunged as broad risk aversion swept through markets on renewed concerns over an escalation of tensions in the Middle East and worries about higher-for-longer US rates.】

item.title: 日本日经指数因芯片和中东问题下跌逾 3
item.description: 日本股市下跌，日经 225 平均指数跌幅超过 3%，正逐步走向技术性修正。【原文：Japanese stocks fell, with the Nikkei 225 Stock Average down over 3% and inching toward a technical correction.】

item.title: 日本依赖能源进口，石油给日元带来更多风险
item.description: 如果说日元走软的理由还不够充分，那么油价上涨将打击依赖能源进口的日本及其货币的风险正在显现。【原文：As if the yen doesn’t have enough reasons to weaken, risks are emerging that higher oil prices will hit energy import-dependent Japan and its currency.】

item.title: 中东风险引发避险买盘，国债获得喘息机会
item.description: 由于对中东冲突升级的担忧增强了对避险资产的需求，国债随美元走高。【原文：Treasuries advanced with the dollar as concerns over an escalation in the Middle East conflict bolstered demand for safe-haven assets.】

item.title: 友邦保险千亿美元股价大跌打破牛市和交易历史
item.description: 友邦保险集团股份有限公司（AIA Group Ltd.）股价的长期下滑与市场一致看涨的建议背道而驰，现在已经偏离了其跟踪中国股市的一贯路线。【原文：The prolonged slide in shares of AIA Group Ltd. stands at odds with the street’s unanimous bullish recommendation and has now diverted the stock from its usual course of tracking the Chinese equity market.】

item.title: 中东冲突引发担忧，黄金飙升突破 2,400 美元
item.description: 由于对以色列和伊朗之间紧张局势加剧的担忧刺激了避险需求，黄金飙升至每盎司 2400 美元。【原文：Gold surged past $2,400 an ounce as concerns over rising tensions between Israel and Iran stoked haven demand.】

item.title: 中国人工智能 "淘金热 "中的散户交易商没有太脆弱的联系
item.description:
随着中国建立起另一个生态系统，正在寻找潜在的本土赢家--无论他们多么默默无闻。【原文：

Hunt is on for potential homegrown winners – however obscure – as China builds out an alternative ecosystem.

】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。对私人信贷的担忧。债券的持续抛售伊朗就核政策发出警告。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. Concerns about private credit. The ongoing selloff in bonds. And a warning from Iran about nuclear policies. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 中国人民银行更容易控制人民币可能源于贸易加权走强
item.description: 中国政府对美元的货币防御有可能因其对中国贸易轨道上其他主要货币的副作用而功亏一篑。【原文：Beijing’s currency defense against the dollar risks coming undone by the side effect it is having against the other major currencies in China’s trading orbit.】

item.title: 风险厌恶情绪抵消中东风险，石油将出现周度下跌
item.description: 由于美联储决策者的鹰派言论引发了更广泛的风险厌恶情绪，加上中东地区伊朗和以色列之间的紧张局势，石油价格出现了今年以来的首次连续周度下跌。【原文：Oil headed for its first back-to-back weekly drop this year as a wider risk-off mood driven by hawkish comments from Federal Reserve policymakers countered tensions in the Middle East between Iran and Israel.】

item.title: 澳大利亚矿业股票落后于全球同行，铁矿石拖后腿
item.description: 由于中国经济复苏不平衡以及金属价格波动，澳大利亚矿业股的表现落后于全球同类股票的幅度是一年多来最大的。【原文：The performance of Australia’s mining stocks is lagging their global peers by the the most in over a year, as China’s uneven recovery and volatile metal prices weigh on shares.】

item.title: 对冲基金怒斥中国教育公司违约
item.description: 在中国一家盈利的教育公司于 3 月份违约发行可转换债券后，对冲基金和其他国际投资者敲响了警钟。【原文：Hedge funds and other international investors are sounding alarms after a profitable education company from China defaulted on its convertible bonds in March.】

item.title: 印度大选拉开帷幕，莫迪押注第三次连任
item.description: 近 10 亿印度人将于周五开始在为期六周多的选举中投票，权衡是否让总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）第三次连任五年，继续推行他的经济和印度教民族主义混合政策。【原文：Almost 1 billion Indians begin voting Friday in elections lasting more than six weeks, weighing up whether to hand Prime Minister Narendra Modi a third five-year term to continue his mix of economic and Hindu nationalist policies.】

item.title: 地缘政治风险加剧，S&P 下调以色列评级
item.description: 由于该地区地缘政治风险加剧，S&P 全球评级公司将以色列的信用评级从 AA- 下调至 A+，这是以色列有史以来首次被下调主权评级。【原文：Israel received its first-ever sovereign downgrade as S&P Global Ratings lowered its credit rating to A+ from AA- on heightened geopolitical risks for the region.】

item.title: 智利部长称 Codelco 铜产量受致命事故影响
item.description: 智利国营公司 Codelco 一直在为保住全球最大铜供应商的头衔而奋斗，在其一座矿山发生致命事故后，由于恢复运营的速度缓慢，该公司的产量将出现下降。【原文：Codelco, the Chilean state company battling to retain the title of world’s largest copper supplier, is set to suffer a dip in output amid a slow resumption of operations after a fatal accident at one of its mines.】

item.title: 美联储鹰派言论引发亚洲股市下跌：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市早盘将下跌，此前美国股市和国债延续了本月的跌势，此前稳健的经济数据和鹰派的美联储言论强化了利率将在更长时间内保持较高水平的猜测。【原文：Asian stocks are set to fall in early trading after US shares and Treasuries extended this month’s selloff after solid economic readings and hawkish Fedspeak reinforced speculation that interest rates will remain higher for longer.】

item.title: 墨西哥官员表示，促进上市的规则草案已准备就绪
item.description: 墨西哥财政部副部长加布里埃尔-约里奥（Gabriel Yorio）表示，墨西哥正在对促进更多债务和股票上市所需的法规草案进行最后的润色，这是立法者去年通过的一项改革的目标。【原文：Mexico is putting the final touches to draft regulations needed to spur more debt and equity listings, the goal of a reform passed by lawmakers last year, according to Deputy Finance Minister Gabriel Yorio.】

item.title: 中国旨在结束困扰股市的 "泡沫时代
item.description: 中国正在十年一度的资本市场改革计划中转向价值投资，力求结束多年来由投机者推动的繁荣与萧条交替的局面。【原文：China is seeking to end the years of speculator driven boom-and-bust trading by pivoting toward value investment in its once-a-decade capital-market reform plan.】

item.title: 前简街交易员否认为千禧年窃取机密
item.description: 简街集团的两名前交易员否认了该公司的指控，即他们窃取了一项机密且 "价值巨大 "的专有交易策略，并将其用于他们在千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）的新工作中。【原文：Two former Jane Street Group traders denied the firm’s allegation that they stole a confidential and “immensely valuable” proprietary trading strategy to use in their new jobs at Millennium Management.】

item.title: 巴拉圭期待下半年债务进一步去美元化的窗口期
item.description: 巴拉圭财政部长卡洛斯-费尔南德斯（Carlos Fernandez）表示，如果能以优惠利率将部分美元债务转换为期限较长的本币债券，巴拉圭可能会在今年下半年这样做。【原文：Paraguay might swap some of its US dollar debt for longer duration local currency bonds in the second half of the year if it can do so at favorable interest rates, Finance Minister Carlos Fernandez said.】

item.title: EyeCare Partners 即将达成债务交换和新融资协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，EyeCare Partners LLC 公司即将达成一项交易，在削减债务负担的同时，还能从一群债权人那里获得新的资金。【原文：EyeCare Partners LLC is nearing a deal that would slash its debt load while also providing it with fresh money from a group of creditors, according to people with knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 美国垃圾债券基金出现一年多来最大规模资金外流
item.description: 由于美联储对通胀的鹰派态度令投资者警惕，投资于美国企业高收益票据的基金出现了一年多来最大的资金外流。【原文：Funds that invest in US corporate high-yield notes saw the biggest outflow in more than a year as the Federal Reserve’s hawkish approach to inflation makes investors wary.】

item.title: 印尼财政部长旨在保护经济免受美元升值影响
item.description: 印尼财政部长表示，印尼政府正与央行行长佩里-瓦尔吉约（Perry Warjiyo）合作，以缓解美元升值对印尼经济的影响。【原文：The Indonesian government is working with central bank governor Perry Warjiyo to cushion the country’s economy from the rise in the US dollar, according to its finance minister.】

item.title: 日本首相铃木称，除利率差距外，日元还受 "各种因素 "影响
item.description: 日本财务大臣铃木俊一表示，与美国的利率差距只是影响日元的众多因素之一，日元对美元汇率正徘徊在 34 年来的低点附近。【原文：Japanese Finance Minister Shunichi Suzuki said an interest rate gap with the US is just one of many factors weighing on the yen, which is hovering around a 34-year low against the dollar.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚总统告诉波哥大居民，到别处去喝水吧
item.description: 哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）要求波哥大居民在周末离开该市，以缓解该市受干旱影响的水库所承受的压力。【原文：Colombian President Gustavo Petro asked Bogota residents to leave the city over the weekend to ease pressure on the drought-hit water reservoirs that serve the city.】

item.title: Acentra Health 降低私人债务再融资利率
item.description: Acentra Health LLC 下调了定期贷款利率，这是与一组私人信用贷款机构进行的更大规模交易的一部分，该交易对现有贷款进行了再融资，并筹集了更多债务。【原文：Acentra Health LLC cut its interest rate on a term loan, part of a larger transaction with a group of private credit lenders that refinanced existing loans and raised additional debt.】

item.title: 股票大跌后，特朗普媒体建议 "长期 "投资者挫败空头
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体公司，其股票的飞速上涨让这位前总统在纸面上赚取了数十亿美元，但随后的快速抛售抹去了超过三分之二的涨幅。【原文：Donald Trump’s social media company, whose meteoric stock gains made the former president billions on paper before a rapid selloff wiped out more than two-thirds of the advance, took the unusual step of advising investors how to prevent bets against the firm.】

item.title: 图斯克称英国苏纳克不久将访问波兰讨论安全问题
item.description: 波兰总理唐纳德-图斯克周四表示，英国首相里希-苏纳克将 "很快 "访问波兰，讨论安全问题，北约领导人延斯-斯托尔滕贝格也可能一同到访。【原文：UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak will visit Poland “soon” to discuss security topics, and may be joined by NATO boss Jens Stoltenberg, Premier Donald Tusk said on Thursday.】

item.title: Oaktree 为第七期电力机会基金募集 25 亿美元资金
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）正寻求为其最新一期 Power Opportunities 基金筹集 25 亿美元。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management is seeking to raise $2.5 billion for the latest vintage of its Power Opportunities fund, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】
